about_the_game:
Haunting original score for The Watchers from established British composer, Peter Fender.

There are 10 tracks that comprise over 30 minutes worth of music in 320kbps MP3 format.

Track listing:
1) And All Shall Be
2) Haze
3) I Am Free
4) Plenty of FX Time (Trio effects)
5) Power Cut
6) Soul
7) Wondering
8) Weight of Being
9) All Shall Be (strings)
10) And All Shall Be (jazz)
